content:
EditorinChief

SGA President Adran Gibbs is sworn in during his inauguration Nov PERIOD  PERIOD

SGA President Adran Gibbs and Vice President Prince OheneNyako were sworn in on Nov PERIOD  replacing their predecessors Yaseen Shurbaji and Hannah Hardin PERIOD

The ceremony was held in the Conoco Student Leadership Center and had a few words from Shurbaji to begin then Gibbs and OheneNyako were sworn in and spoke as well thanking everyone who supported them throughout their campaign PERIOD

Now that hes inaugurated Gibbs said he is most looking forward to selecting members of their cabinet PERIOD

Were really excited to get a cabinet put together and were really excited for them to start working on their projects Gibbs said PERIOD

OheneNyako said one of the first things he hopes to do in the next few weeks is get acquainted with more members of SGA PERIOD

I just want to build relationships with the rest of SGA to make sure were all on the same page and so that well be able to work together and with the staff as well OheneNyako said PERIOD

Although Shurbaji and Hardin are no longer in office Gibbs said their administration would still like to have their advice on policy and building staff relationships PERIOD

Were gonna look to them for experience and advice and leadership OheneNyako said PERIOD Honestly Yaseen and Hannah are big role models in my life and in Adrans life and they are literally the definition of being a leader. gibbs said the inauguration was sentimental to him since the last inauguration he attended he was as Shurbajis incoming chief of staff PERIOD

It was a really different feeling Gibbs said PERIOD Exciting though really exciting PERIOD It was also nice to know that we have such a great support system whether its friend staff faculty or people within SGA currently  its just really a great feeling to know that all of those people have your back. editorinChief

title: Adran Gibbs, Prince Ohene-Nyako sworn in as SGA president, vice president | News | oudaily.com
name: University of Oklahoma
